column1: #Text=" Zaheer says : " It 's nice to see you again , Ghazan .

#Text=Where did you pick up the new skills ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I have Harmonic Convergence to thank for that .
#Text=I believe it 's a sign that our path is a righteous one .
